bio:
I'm Jayasurya Sudhakaran, a passionate Software Developer and DevOps enthusiast pursuing my MCA. I specialize in Python, Django, and deploying cloud-native applications using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.

I’ve built real-world platforms like a freelance marketplace, social media app, and coding challenge site—each designed with clean architecture and deployed using automation tools on AWS. I focus on writing scalable, secure, and maintainable code.Certified in Red Hat System Administration, Kubernetes.  I'm continuously learning and exploring modern DevOps practices and infrastructure as code.
